name: Vasco Brattka
content: Theoretical Computers Science and Mathematical Logic - Prof. Dr. Vasco Brattka Vasco Brattka Professor for Theoretical Computer Science and Mathematical Logic Institut for Theoretical Computer Science, Mathematics and OR Faculty of Computer Science Universität der Bundeswehr München Werner-Heisenberg-Weg 39 85577 Neubiberg, Germany +49 89 6004 2243 +49 89 6004 2876 Office 1403, Building 41-400 (teaching) (research) Honorary Research Associate Research Interests Laboratory of Discrete Mathematics & Theoretical Computer Science Department of Mathematics & Applied Mathematics University of Cape Town Private Bag X3 Rondebosch 7701, South Africa Computable Analysis Computability Theory Effective Descriptive Set Theory Algorithmic Randomness Complexity and Logic Weihrauch Complexity Memberships Network Computability and Complexity in Analysis (CCA) Association Computability in Europe (CiE) Resource for Computability Theorists (Computability) European Association for Theoretical Computer Science (EATCS) Deutsche Vereinigung für Mathematische Logik und für Grundlagen der Exakten Wissenschaften (DVMLG) Association for Symbolic Logic (ASL) American Mathematical Society (AMS) Awards Shoenfield Prize of the Association for Symbolic Logic 2022 Silver Medal of the Kurt Gödel Research Prize Fellowship 2008 Professional Activities Editor-in-Chief of Computability - The Journal of the Association CiE, published by IOS Press in Amsterdam Chair of the Steering Committee of the international conference series Computability and Complexity in Analysis (CCA) Member of the Editorial Board of the book series Theory and Applications of Computability, published by Springer in Heidelberg in cooperation with CiE Member of the Editorial Board of the Journal of Universal Computer Science Member of the Committee on Logic in Europe of the Association for Symbolic Logic (ASL) Co-Organizer of the online seminar on Computability Theory and Applications Member of
